GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.18.15
GSD.description:
net: stmmac: fix dma queue left shift overflow issue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit e846bde09677fa3b203057846620b7ed96540f5f, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit d43042f4da3e1c2e4ccac3b1d9153cb0798533a4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: stmmac: fix dma queue left shift overflow issue
